sentences.en: He cannot transfuse the knowledge into your brain.
sentences.cn: 他不能把知识灌入您的脑子。

sentences.en: In the past, the flow of vein transfuse belonged to pure technology flow.
sentences.cn: 过去的静脉输液流程是纯技术流程.

sentences.en: Objective To study Non - PVC officinal compounding velamen and glass bottle with transfuse of compatibility.
sentences.cn: 目的研究 非 PVC多层共挤膜输液袋及玻璃瓶与大容量注射剂的相容性.

sentences.en: Results The chief transfuse reactions are fever and cutaneous eruption.
sentences.cn: 结果:输血反应主要表现为发热及皮疹.

sentences.en: The restructuration flow is that combines warm vein transfuse flow with using vein indwelling needle.
sentences.cn: 温馨静脉输液流程与使用静脉留置针输液流程是流程再造.

sentences.en: There are no rules about when to transfuse and who to do it to.
sentences.cn: 从来没有相关规定，在什么时候什么人应该被输血。

sentences.en: They are the only medevac service to have doctors on board able to transfuse blood while in the air, and they use some of the most innovative techniques in the field.
sentences.cn: 他们在唯一的救伤直升机上给伤员输血，在战地条件下运用一些最新的技术来救治伤员。

sentences.en: Whether you can transfuse your blood to him depends on whether your blood type matches his.
sentences.cn: 你是否可以给他输血要看你的血型与他的血型是否想配。

words.tran_cn: [临床] 输血；[临床] 输液；倾注；灌输

trans.tran_cn: 输（血或别的液体），渗透，使…被灌输或传达
